packBlocks.bioText: Give away our Tasting Menu is to give away an unforgettable experience.
Complement the Aürt Menu with our Wines Selection pairing and the Cheese plate and so they will enjoy the full experience.
We will generate a PERSONALIZED VOUCHER with the name of the person to whom you want to make the gift and the amount of people who are invited.
The person who receives the Voucher must contact us in advance to agree on the day and time of the reservation.
Check the conditions of reservation when booking.
